text: Jabb tum ghanimaten lenay janay lago gay to jhat say yeh peechay choray huye log kehney lagen gay kay humen bhi apnay sath chalney ki ijazat dijiye’ woh chahtay hain kay Allah Taalaa kay kalam ko badal dein aap keh dijiye! Kay Allah Taalaa pehaly hi farma chuka hai kay tum hergiz humaray sath nahi chalo gay’ woh iss ka jawab dein gay (nahi nahi) bulkay tum hum say hasad kertay ho’ (asal baat yeh hai) kay woh log boht hi kum samjhtay hain
